sub_title: FM Director EMEA - CBRE Global Workplace Solutions (GWS) EMEA
summary: Dynamic and motivated individual with diverse experience in different industries. Technically sound with great people skills. Proven manager of large and diverse teams with a strategic outlook. Goal orientated with strong desire to achieve success.

school.name: University of South Africa/Universiteit van Suid-Afrika

awards.title: Subject Matter Expert
awards.description: Appointed subject matter expert for front of house services in the Johnson Controls Global SME drive.

certifications.name: Learn Emotional Intelligence, the Key Determiner of Success
Using Questions to Foster Critical Thinking and Curiosity

profile_positions.description:
Provide strategic management of all the corporate Facilities teams throughout EMEA @ Uber.
Ensure that a trust relationship is established and maintained with all stakeholders across the region and that regular consultation is done to keep the FM services aligned with the business vision in the region.
Manage and report on $10M+ revenue annually.
Ensure that budgets for the region are robust and that services are delivered within those budgets. Oversee budget spend, forecasting and invoicing for region.
Management of all FM related projects throughout the region and ensure that all projects are delivered to the highest standards.
Strategic oversight of supplier services in the region. Negotiate contracts and own relationships with suppliers ensuring that services are delivered successfully and continuous improvement is implemented.
Ensure Health and Safety compliance for all offices in region and align to global standards.
Management of +25K sqm's and provision of 5 star FM services to +3000 clients in 8 countries
profile_positions.title: FM Director EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Head up the day-to-day Facilities Management operation teams throughout South Africa.
Responsible for delivering the strategic facilities management services to all sites in SA.
Establish and develop relationships with Senior Management and provide strategic solutions for company vision.
Budget preparation, management and forecasting for SA region.
Provide detailed scope requirements for renovation/space planning initiatives with implementation of associated project management disciplines.
Implement and maintain EHS/SCM initiatives to ensure compliance with goals, objectives, and required metrics, planning and scheduling deadlines.
Lead in meeting the current and projected Facilities Management requirements, establish clear and measurable service delivery levels that support business objectives.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Facilities Management

profile_positions.description:
Overseeing the day-to-day Facilities Management operation teams throughout South Africa on behalf of General Electric.
Responsible for delivering the strategic facilities management services to all sites in SA.
Establish and develop relationships with local GE business leaders to understand their business needs in order to provide them with suitable facilities solutions.  
Budget preparation, management and forecasting for SA region.
Provide detailed scope requirements for renovation/space planning initiatives with implementation of associated project management disciplines.
Implement and maintain EHS/SCM initiatives to ensure compliance with goals, objectives, and required metrics, planning and scheduling deadlines.
Lead in meeting the current and projected Facilities Management requirements, establish clear and measurable service delivery levels that support business objectives.
profile_positions.title: Facilities Account Manager GE South Africa

profile_positions.description:
Management of the various soft & hard services.
Management of the various contracts and maintenance agreements pertaining to service delivery as well as planned preventative maintenance.
Procurement and management of new service providers as well as product quality control and sourcing.
Part of the project management team at Adcock Ingram for the building extension project.
Project manager for the Midrand Corporate Gym project, Pallet roof project as well as the Cape Town Cold Room.
Part of the design team and managing of the building and processes.
Program and maintain Metasys Building Management System V5.1.
Manage 3 generators with 23kl diesel tank on site. 4 Deep-sea Electronics 8660 Generator controllers.
Responsible for innovation such as recycling on site as well as finding better/more efficient cleaning methods. Implementation of various water saving methods by for instance the use of borehole water.
Management of property and leases.
Establish and maintain a trust relationship with the client.
profile_positions.title: Facilities Manager

profile_positions.description:

•	Writing and sending of quotations to clients.
•	Client relationship management.
profile_positions.title: Specialised Services Manager

company.name: The Aviator Hotel in Farnborough UK

profile_positions.company: The Aviator Hotel in Farnborough UK
profile_positions.description:
Establish and maintain key relationships with guests to ensure they always have a personal point of contact in the hotel.
Maintain these relationships whilst ensuring that all departments are kept informed of guest needs and expectations.
Assist guests with any special requirements and ensure information and resources are available to all staff so that the same level of service is available out of normal hours.
Maximise revenue by up selling hotel facilities and capitalising on dining and event opportunities.
Assist in the recruitment and training of staff, ensuring that they have the skill/experience required.
Ensure that a specific guest/customer outlook was kept by all departments in the hotel.
profile_positions.title: Guest Relations Manager
